https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/59u5uPCR8gCFMXLPJMvzFMRgwcc.jpg A college student files a police complaint against the adopted son of a gangster for shooting his girlfriend. However, the gangster is shocked to learn that the student is his real son. Arinthum Ariyamalum
